title: Coated electrode for liquid thermoelectric conversion device to enhance Fe2+/Fe3+ redox kinetics/
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00220B, Paper
Touya Aiba, Dai Inoue, Yukata Moritomo
Liquid thermoelectric conversion device (LTE) converts temperature difference between the electrode into electric energy via electrochemical Seebeck coefficient Î±. Here, we systematically investigated the Fe2+/Fe3+ redox kinetics at graphite-dispersing coated...
